channel.title: 🏢 Institute of Computing Technology, CAS on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Institute of Computing Technology, CAS on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: CausalDiff: Causality-Inspired Disentanglement via Diffusion Model for Adversarial Defense
item.description: CausalDiff leverages causal inference and diffusion models to create a robust AI defense against unseen adversarial attacks, significantly outperforming state-of-the-art methods.
